text:
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information when you use our Zoom app.
We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.
Our Zoom app collects and retains the following information:

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Breakout apps, which are sent directly to users' browser.
We collect the name you provide when using our Zoom app.
Breakout apps will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.
We retain the user name you provide only for the duration of your session.
